attributes.action: Make Eid an official Public holiday...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All this talk about "Equal rights"

Does this not apply to White British Citizens too?

We work every year, Covering the workload of muslims everywhere, whilst they have their Christmas (EID). This should be made a Public holiday for the entire country, or muslims who celebrate Eid rather than christmas, should work over christmas, like we do for them.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
